casebody.data:
STATE,
v.
Ryan Gabriel GARCELL, No. 465A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 29, 2008. Thomas Maher, Ann Marie Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Ryan Gabriel Garcell. Charlie C. Walker, Asheville, William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of January 2008 by State of NC for Extension of Time to File Brief & Response to Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Allowed. State of NC shall have up to and including the 14th day of March 2008 to file and serve his/her brief With this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of January 2008."
